VisualEditor.deleteFixedInscructionMessage: Click on any fixed columns you would like to delete and press the button again to finalize.
VisualEditor.reorderInscructionMessage: Click on up/down arrows to reorder and press the button again to finalize.
VisualEditor.mergeInscructionMessage: Click on any columns you would like to merge and press the button again.
VisualEditor.unionColumnNumberWarning: Union requires for both tables to have the same number of columns.

infoPanel.howToUseVE: How to use the Visual Editor
infoPanel.info1: Rows can be connected to rows from a different table by clicking & dragging, starting from the right side of
infoPanel.info2: Hold Shift & drag to multi-select elements.
infoPanel.info3: Press Delete on your keyboard to delete selected elements.
infoPanel.info4: Press Shift and use the mouse wheel to zoom in & out.
infoPanel.info5: Click & drag on the blank space to drag the whole diagram, drag a table to move it around.
infoPanel.info6b: of a table to add a fixed column.
infoPanel.info7: You can delete and merge columns with Enable Delete and Enable Merge buttons. Note that only fixed columns can be deleted.
infoPanel.info8: Click on a column to mark it as a Dataset column.
infoPanel.info9: Use Merge Columns to merge selected columns.
infoPanel.info10: Click on a table title to mark it as selected for Union / Cross Join. If you have selected 2 or more tables, click on the button Union / Cross Join to connect them.
infoPanel.infoPanel.dsColumnMultiSelect-2: on the upper left corner of a table to mark all columns as Dataset columns or invert selection.
infoPanel.enableReorderInfo: Click on Enable Column Re-order to change the columns order.

ArtefactValidation.ncnameid: ID should start with a letter and can contain only alphanumeric characters, underscore (_) and dash (-)

ArtefactValidation.version: Version can contain only numeric characters separated by a dot (.)
